segments.text: This kitchen is a total disaster; the sink's overflowing like a fountain gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring everywhere, soaking the cabinets— what a filthy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, drying a plate, foot in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she smell the dampness or hear the water? Gross negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter, probably getting splashed too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, kids raiding the cookie jar on a rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand deep in the jar, probably getting crumbs all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's tilting; imagine the crash and more mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's reaching up, palm out, like she's begging for sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Secret cookie theft in a flooding kitchen—how tacky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks clean and inviting, unlike this slop inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such avoidable filth build up.
segments.speaker: PAR
